text: I bought this game at launch and played it intensively for about 6 months until the release of WoW. It was okay but the gameplay was very repetitive and it was all about grinding the same monsters for hours until you were strong enough to go to the next zone. I had a rogue-type Elf and I wasï»¿ at a big tower (Cruma Tower?) when I stopped playing. I have a Lineage 2 edition Coca-Cola from South Korea, had it since 2004... musn't taste too great now!
author: SupraDarky
